Title: Popular Hero Play Recommendations
Text:
[Current Recommendations]

"Banners raised with pride, warriors fight in valorous stride; a lone spear pierces the waning moon's guide."
Relive dreams of the past and traverse through time and space. The immersive play Moonlight Shines as Ever is coming soon.

"The flames I unleash shall consume every trace of wickedness, leaving only ashes in its wake."
Re-release of the classic: Hero Play Fiamma

[Theater Audience Etiquette]
1. The Jinzhou Theater is an open-air venue. Please be mindful of public order.
2. Please arrive at the theater on time and remain in your seat for the entire performance. If you must leave, exit quietly without distracting your fellow audience members.
3. During the performance, turn off your Terminal or, if it must be on, put it on vibrate.
4. There is no photography or videoing allowed in the theater.
5. Trespassing on the stage is strictly prohibited and violators will be handled by Patrollers.
6. After the performance, please take your trash with you.
